update nmj_csds_mage
part_year = #{partYear,jdbcType=INTEGER},
month = #{month,jdbcType=INTEGER},
cs_ds = #{csDs,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
create_by = #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

update_date = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},

update nmj_csds_mage set part_year = #{partYear,jdbcType=INTEGER}, month = #{month,jdbcType=INTEGER}, cs_ds = #{csDs,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, create_by = #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_by = #{updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_date = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, remarks = #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, del_flag = #{delFlag,jdbcType=CHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select:
select
from nmj_csds_mage where del_flag='0'
and part_year = #{partYear}
order by part_year desc, `month` desc
